PSCT.Base: Target 1 Level 8 or higher Fusion Monster you control; destroy all monsters your opponent controls with an equal or higher ATK than that monster. During the End Phase, if this card is in the GY because it was sent there to activate the effect of "Fallen of Albaz" this turn: You can Set this card. You can only use this effect of "Judgment of the Branded" once per turn.
